home.title: WIN YOUR DREAM WATCH
home.subtitle: Our team select the most beautiful watches, with a focus on elegance. With more than 260 partners around the world.
home.subtitle2: “An assured winner who will achieve his dream or simply that of his partner”
home.chooseyourticketsdesc: Choose how many tickets you want - up to 25 per person - and you're on the way to winning the luxury timepiece.
home.playthegamedesc: Test your watch knowledge in our online game – built to sort the connoisseurs from the pretenders.
home.buyticketsdesc: Pay securely to submit your entry. We use a third party Random Number Generator called Randomdraws to choose the winner.
home.winawatchdesc: And that's it! You could walk away with a new £20,000 watch – for as little as £25.
home.certiftitle: WE USE TPAL ELECTRONIC RANDOM DRAW COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM
home.followusdesc: Don't miss the live draw and the announcement of the next competitions on Instagram !
home.competitions2: THE COMPETITIONS, HOW TO PLAY, CONTACT, PHILOSOPHY, TRUSTPILOT, CHARITY, ACCEPTABLE USE POLICY, FAQ, RETURN POLICY, TERMS & CONDITIONS, PRIVACY POLICY

philosophy.philoheader: IN OUR FAMILY OWNER BUSINESS, WE BELIEVE THAT THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS GENIUS, ONLY “KNOW-HOW”
philosophy.philoheaderdesc: We are a large family-owned company where our team works tirelessly every day to bring you the most sought-after timepieces. We founded WINUWATCH with the goal of helping individuals turn their dream of owning a luxury watch into a reality.
philosophy.philotext: YOU SHOULD KNOW THAT WE ARE THE NUMBER 1 SITE IN THE WORLD IN TERMS OF PROBABILITY OF WINNING
philosophy.philotextdesc: We are the number 1 site in the world in terms of probability of winning because we publish a limited number of tickets aligned with the number of participants makes us the best probability of winning.
